# Auto-generated by unified agent
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16)
include(CTest)
enable_testing()

# Collect all C++ test sources under tests/
file(GLOB_RECURSE TEST_SOURCES CONFIGURE_DEPENDS *.cpp)

if(NOT TEST_SOURCES)
  message(STATUS "No *.cpp tests found under tests/; nothing to build")
  return()
endif()

include(FetchContent)
FetchContent_Declare(
  googletest
  URL https://github.com/google/googletest/archive/refs/tags/v1.14.0.zip
)
set(gtest_force_shared_crt ON CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
FetchContent_MakeAvailable(googletest)

add_executable(project_tests ${TEST_SOURCES})
target_link_libraries(project_tests PRIVATE GTest::gtest_main)

include(GoogleTest)
gtest_discover_tests(project_tests)
